message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand that $90 is a bit tight for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $110 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product.

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're trying to get a good deal. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $105. It's a fair price, considering the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not sure $105 is the best price for me. I'd be willing to pay $98 for the product.
